title: Sophos Central Cloud - Alerts
description: This dashboard provides information about the Alerts generated by Sophos Central Cloud.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard provides information about the Alerts generated by Sophos Central Cloud.

## Widgets
1. Total Alerts
2. Count of High Alerts
3. Count of Medium Alerts
4. Count of Low Alerts
5. Severity Over Time
6. Total Actionable Alerts
7. Top 10 Sources
8. Distribution by Endpoint and IP
9. Endpoint Type Over Time
10. Distribution by Endpoint OS
11. Distribution by Type
12. Top 10 Threats
13. Distribution by Threat Status
14. Distribution by Threat Cleanable Status
15. Alerts by Country
16. Health Status
17. OS Details
18. Isolation and Lockdown Status
19. Log Details
